word_mean: 氘核，重氢核：用作使原子核蜕变的轰击粒子

sentence.Network_en: The binding energy of the deuteron can be found experimentally.
sentence.Network_cn: 可以实验测定氘的结合能.

sentence.Network_en: The deuteron can fuse with another proton to make a helium 3 nucleus.
sentence.Network_cn: 氘核可以和另一个质子聚合以生成一个氦3核.

sentence.Network_en: In fact , the nuclear effect in the deuteron structure function is not negligible.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此有必要单独对氘核的结构函数进行研究.
